author: felixweber
title: Ledger Live Integration
description: Ledger users need to rely on 3rd party wallets to manage their ADA, this causes confusion and increases the likelihood of users being hacked
solution: Add support for ADA and Cardano Native tokens to Ledger Live enabling ADA holders to manage their digital assets from one application.
experience: Ledger Team, Strica ( Cardanoscan ) and The Ambassadors guild provide all needed expertise and skills to succesfully execute this proposal
